description: A bulky magazine, big enough to not only accodomade the spring-loaded papershells, but to also carry the pressurized air tank. Due to this design, it becomes very unvieldy to store.
A pretty long magazine, big enough to accomodate 5 spring-loaded balls, but also carry the built-in pressurized air tank. Due to this design, it becomes very unvieldy to store.
A pretty long and noticably deeper magazine, big enough to accomodate 10 spring-loaded balls, but also carry the built-in pressurized air tank. Due to this design, it becomes very unvieldy to store.
